CodeBlockMethod.Name: get_rank
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local user_num = _DataStorageService:GetSortableDataStorage("Num") local score_data = _DataStorageService:GetSortableDataStorage("Score") local user_data = _DataStorageService:GetGlobalDataStorage("UserID")
local a = 1 --a,self.user_num = user_num:GetAndWait("1") for id = 1, self.user_num,1 do a, self.user_DB[id] = user_data:GetAndWait(tostring(id)) a, self.score_DB[id] = score_data:GetAndWait(self.user_DB[id]) end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: update_rank
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local user_num = _DataStorageService:GetSortableDataStorage("Num") local score_data = _DataStorageService:GetSortableDataStorage("Score") local user_data = _DataStorageService:GetGlobalDataStorage("UserID") local a = 1 --a,self.user_num = user_num:GetAndWait("1")
local flag = -1 local error, val = score_data:GetAndWait(user)
if(error == 0) then score_data:SetAndWait(user,score) else score_data:SetAndWait(user,score) user_data:SetAndWait(tostring(self.user_num+1),user) user_num:SetAndWait("1",self.user_num+1) end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code: local user_num = _DataStorageService:GetSortableDataStorage("Num") local score_data = _DataStorageService:GetSortableDataStorage("Score") local user_data = _DataStorageService:GetGlobalDataStorage("UserID") local user_id = {"a","b","c","d","e","f","g","h","i","j","dd","ddd","DDD","ASD","ASDASD","fk","z","Zd","ZA","zx","x","xx"} local scores = {99,98,97,64,45,44,34,33,32,31,30,29,28,22,21,20,19,18,17,16,14,13,12} local callback = function(errorcode, key) --log(key.."값이 저장됨") end for id = 1, 20, 1 do score_data:SetAsync(user_id[id],scores[id],callback) user_data:SetAsync(tostring(id),user_id[id],callback) end user_num:SetAsync("1",20,callback) --_DataStorageService:GetGlobalDataStoragePagesAndWait()

CodeBlockMethod.Name: ELO
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local win_prab = 1/(10^((win_score - lose_score)/400) + 1) local lose_prab = 1 - win_prab local win = win_score + 10*lose_prab local lose = lose_score - 10*win_prab
self:update_rank(win,winner) self:update_rank(lose,loser)

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleKeyDownEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local key = event.key -------------------------------------------------------- if(key == KeyboardKey.Space and self.is_near == true) then self:get_rank() wait(5) self:print_rank() end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerEnterEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity -------------------------------------------------------- if(_UserService.LocalPlayer == TriggerBodyEntity) then self.is_near = true end

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleTriggerLeaveEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local TriggerBodyEntity = event.TriggerBodyEntity -------------------------------------------------------- if(_UserService.LocalPlayer == TriggerBodyEntity) then self.is_near = false end
